description:
Kaku is first seen as one of the five foremen of http://anidb.net/ch3262 [Galley-La Company]`s Dock One and specializes in mechanics diagnostics and housecalls. It was Kaku that inspected the http://anidb.net/ch2028 [Going Merry] and informed the http://anidb.net/ch1954 [Straw Hats] that it was irreparable. Later on it is revealed that Kaku is a member of http://anidb.net/ch3295 [CP9] operating undercover in order to obtain the Pluton blueprints from http://anidb.net/ch3264 [Iceburg].
Kaku has big black eyes and a long nose similar to http://anidb.net/ch478 [Usopp]`s only rectangular. He also has chatain hair. When he worked for the Galley-La Company, he wore a white cap, a high-collared orange shirt with blue sleeves, jeans and white sneakers. When he was revealed to be working for CP9, he wore a black cap, a black suit jacket with an orange handkerchief in the breast-pocket over a high-collared black shirt, pants and shoes.
When invading Iceburg`s mansion he was wearing the skull mask.
In SBS volume 44 he was depicted in an SBS as a child.
name: Kaku
